name: GreenbrierChurch
0:
”Alexa, open Greenbrier Message”
”Alexa, ask Greenbrier Message for the latest talk”
”Alexa, start Greenbrier Message”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: greenbrier message
des: Listen to the latest messages from greenbrier church. You can pause and play by saying "Alexa, pause" and "Alexa, resume." Just say "Alexa, stop" when you're done for the day. When listening to podcasts you can say "Alexa, shuffle" to shuffle the playing order, or "Alexa, loop" to loop the current episode. You can also ask for previous and next episodes by saying "Alexa, previous" and "Alexa, next".
priv: Your requests to this skill are not shared with the skill developer.
